turkish_example_sentence: Onlar, kötü hava koşulları yüzünden dışarıda voleybol oynayamazlar.
english_example_sentence: They cannot play volleyball outside due to bad weather conditions.
russian_example_sentence: Они не могут играть в волейбол на улице из-за плохих погодных условий.
